title: How can a student after +2 get into a BSc in forensic science? - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Science in Forensic Science

response.answer_text: It's very simple bro. It's nothing like qualifying for IIT or NEET Or CLAT. Just search for colleges in Your nearby area with programme that offers Graduation in Forensic science Give that college entrance..You will be easily selected. There are some govt colleges which offer such courses ..To study in them you have to give their entrance paper which is easy . I have studied b.sc Forensic science in SHUATS , Allahabad..It's a good college but don't go there… There is a college in aurangabad and sagar,m.p. you can go there as they offer graduation course in forensic.they are govt college and good college.you can also download their course syllabus in pdf format from net.have a look of your course before studying . It will increase your excitement. Mostly colleges offer m.sc course in forensic as BHU and LU And GFSU…you can go for them I was very excited about this course when I was of your age but right now I know the real scope of this course in our country…you have to struggle so please know this…its nothing as what you will expect . If you have more queries ask .
Visit IPU University delhi. You have to clear entrance exam for this amd syllabus can be downloaded from their site start prepping n get admission. Good luck.
